## What is this?

This extension provides additional fragment animations for RevealJS presentations.

::: {.fragment .bounceIn}
Animations are powered by [Animate.css](https://animate.style/)
:::

::: {.fragment .fadeIn}
All animations work **forwards** and **backwards**!
:::

## Basic Usage

Use any animation class with `.fragment`:

```markdown
::: {.fragment .bounceIn}
This text bounces in!
:::
```

::: {.fragment .bounceIn}
This text bounces in!
:::

## Inline Animations

Animations work on inline elements too:

```markdown
The [quick]{.fragment .fadeIn} [brown]{.fragment .tada}
[fox]{.fragment .bounceIn} jumps.
```

The [quick]{.fragment .fadeIn} [brown]{.fragment .tada} [fox]{.fragment .bounceIn} jumps over the lazy dog.

## Reversible Behavior

All animations reverse naturally when navigating backwards.

::: {.fragment .backInDown}
`backInDown` enters from top...
:::

::: {.fragment .fadeIn}
...and exits back to top with `backOutUp`
:::

::: {.fragment .slideInLeft}
Try pressing the **left arrow** to see animations reverse!
:::
